title: The Fall
creator_credit: Absolute Entertainment, Googly Films, Deep Films, Tree Top Films Inc., RadicalMedia, Tarsem Singh, Dan Gilroy, Nico Soultanakis, Eiko Ishioka, Ged Clarke, Lionel Kopp, Ray Leakey and Josh Robertson
headline_credit: India and United States of America, 2008
brief_description: In a hospital on the outskirts of 1920s Los Angeles, an injured stuntman tells a fellow patient, a little girl with a broken arm, a fantastic story about five mythical heroes. As the stories unfold, the line between fiction and reality blurs.

constellations_other.name: Painting pictures
constellations_other.description: Painter and photographer Louis Le Prince was inspired to develop the technology to make animated pictures by the circular panoramic paintings of his friends. His films captured everyday life and alluded to his artistic vision for cinema.

creator_credit_for_label: Absolute Entertainment, Googly Films, Deep Films, Tree Top Films Inc., RadicalMedia, Tarsem Singh, Dan Gilroy, Nico Soultanakis, Eiko Ishioka, Ged Clarke, Lionel Kopp, Ray Leakey and Josh Robertson
description: In a hospital on the outskirts of 1920s Los Angeles, an injured stuntman begins to tell a fellow patient, a little girl with a broken arm, a fantastic story about 5 mythical heroes. Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality starts to blur as the tale advances.
description_for_label: In a hospital on the outskirts of 1920s Los Angeles, an injured stuntman begins to tell a fellow patient, a little girl with a broken arm, a fantastic story about 5 mythical heroes. Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality starts to blur as the tale advances.
